snippet: The north Tulsa neighborhoods where two men are accused of shooting five strangers last week have struggled for years with economic problems.
abstract: Largely black neighborhoods of north Tulsa, where three men were murdered during a shooting spree, have struggled for years with economic problems that have left many homes and businesses abandoned; while the shootings have shocked people around the country, residents of the area have become inured to difficulty and violence.
lead_paragraph: The north Tulsa neighborhoods where two men are accused of shooting five strangers last week have struggled for years with economic problems.

headline.seo: Tulsa Shootings Came in Struggling Neighborhoods
headline.main: Death Comes to the Vacant Lots of North Tulsa
headline.print_headline: Death Comes to the Vacant Lots of North Tulsa
